title: Damascus
summary: Damascus (/dəˈmæskəs/ də-MASS-kəs, UK also /dəˈmɑːskəs/ də-MAH-skəs; Arabic: دمشق‎, romanized: Dimašq, IPA: [diˈmaʃq], Syrian Arabic: [dɪˈmaʃʔ]; Classical Syriac: ܕܰܪܡܣܘܩ‎, romanized: Darmswq)[7] is the capital of Syria, the oldest capital in the world and, according to some, the fourth holiest city in Islam.[8][9][10]
